pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Keras Layer Normalization[![Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/keras-layer-normalization.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/keras-layer-normalization/)![License](https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/keras-layer-normalization.svg)Implementation of the paper: [Layer Normalization](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1607.06450.pdf)## Install```bashpip install keras-layer-normalization```## Usage```pythonfrom tensorflow import kerasfrom keras_layer_normalization import LayerNormalizationinput_layer = keras.layers.Input(shape=(2, 3))norm_layer = LayerNormalization()(input_layer)model = keras.models.Model(inputs=input_layer, outputs=norm_layer)model.compile(optimizer='adam', loss='mse', metrics={},)model.summary()```
